chart.title: Sea level rise
chart.subtitle: Global mean sea level rise is measured relative to the 1993 - 2008 average sea level. This is shown as three series: the widely-cited Church & White dataset; the University of Hawaii Sea Level Center (UHLSC); and the average of the two.

Global sea level according to Church and.citationShort: NOAA Climate.gov (2022) – processed by Our World in Data
Global sea level according to Church and.citationLong: NOAA Climate.gov (2022) – processed by Our World in Data. “Church and White (2011)” [dataset]. NOAA Climate.gov, “Climate Change: Global Sea Level” [original data].

Global sea level according to UHSLC.citationShort: NOAA Climate.gov (2022) – processed by Our World in Data
Global sea level according to UHSLC.citationLong: NOAA Climate.gov (2022) – processed by Our World in Data. “UHSLC” [dataset]. NOAA Climate.gov, “Climate Change: Global Sea Level” [original data].
